news.title: What Trump's reclassification of pot and CBD could mean for seniors, research and stocks
news.description: Reclassification to a Schedule III drug and possible Medicare coverage for pot could unlock new investment from pharmaceutical companies.

news.title: Key ACA tax credits likely to expire after House speaker blocks vote
news.description: Democrats in the House back a last-ditch effort to extend Obamacare subsidies, which relies on a tactic recently used for the Jeffrey Epstein files bill.

news.title: Payrolls rose by 64,000 in November after falling by 105,000 in October, delayed jobs numbers show
news.description: Nonfarm payrolls were expected to increase by 45,000 in November as the unemployment rate rose to 4.5%.

news.title: U.S. crude oil drops below $55 a barrel, hits lowest level since early 2021
news.description: The oil market is under pressure as OPEC+ members have rapidly ramped up production and the U.S. pushes Ukraine to accept a peace agreement with Russia.

news.title: Nasdaq moves to make trading nearly 24 hours. Why some on Wall Street say that's a bad idea
news.description: Critics argue that formalizing nearly nonstop trading could worsen some of the very problems that plague the structure of equity markets today.

news.title: This chip play’s strong 2025 run could hit a speed bump as earnings loom, charts show
news.description: Micron is toting a sizable gain on a year-to-date basis as its earnings release approaches, but that momentum may not last.

news.title: Vibe coding startup Lovable's latest funding round values it at $6.6 billion, sources say
news.description: Accel is participating in the round, the sources said, adding it would more than triple the valuation it achieved with its previous round in July.

news.title: S&P 500 falls after delayed jobs figures paint weak picture of economy: Live updates
news.description: The three benchmark U.S. indexes closed lower on Monday, pressured by losses in key artificial intelligence names.

news.title: Here are Bank of America’s top European auto picks for 2026
news.description: BofA's European automotive equity research head Horst Schneider unveiled key sector picks.

news.title: Top Trump aide Susie Wiles says he has 'alcoholic's personality,' sought 'retribution' against NY AG Letitia James
news.description: Wiles, in the rare, candid interviews, described Trump's "reciprocal" tariff policy as "so much thinking out loud."

news.title: Bill to ease Big Tech project permits advances in House
news.description: Backers say the SPEED Act is crucial to helping the U.S. beat out China and other global competitors for leadership in AI.

news.title: Instagram TV app coming to Amazon Fire streaming device
news.description: Meta said Tuesday that it will begin testing its Instagram for TV app in the U.S. via Amazon's Fire TV streaming devices.

news.title: Pfizer’s modest 2026 outlook shows its big investments will take time to pay off
news.description: Pfizer has pursued deals of all sizes to build new revenue streams, but the outlook underscores that those investments are still some distance from paying off.

news.title: Hassett says Fed independence is ‘really important’ and chair candidates shouldn’t be disqualified for being Trump’s friend
news.description: Hassett declined in a CNBC interview to directly address his own candidacy but said forging consensus is an important part of the job.

news.title: China lowers anti-dumping tariffs on European pork exporters
news.description: China on Tuesday announced lower duties on pork imports and pig by-products from the European Union.

news.title: 'Appetizer economy': Food inflation is on restaurant table as diners go smaller with menu choices
news.description: Spending on restaurant appetizers is booming during this period of food inflation as consumers find creative ways to cut back even as they continue to dine out.

news.title: The case for more Fed rate cuts could rest on a 'systematic overcount' of jobs numbers
news.description: There are indications that policymakers will be more inclined to cut further if the labor market stays weak.

news.title: Trump administration's new quarters feature pilgrims, ditching civil rights theme
news.description: Special quarter-dollar coin designs for the U.S.' 250th birthday feature pilgrims and former presidents rather than previously floated civil rights themes.

news.title: Jim Cramer says Amazon is a buy on 2025 underperformance for this key reason
news.description: Jim Cramer says investors better act fast while Amazon stock is still on the sale rack.

news.title: Databricks raises capital at $134 billion valuation in latest funding round
news.description: Companies such as Databricks, SpaceX and OpenAI have reached mega valuations while staying private for longer.

news.title: Jobs data, Tesla's rally, tariff revenue hits $200 billion and more in Morning Squawk
news.description: Here are five key things investors need to know to start the trading day.

news.title: Korea Zinc sinks 14% as largest shareholder group challenges U.S.-backed plans for Tennessee smelter
news.description: Korea Zinc's largest shareholder group is reportedly opposing plans to create a U.S.-backed joint venture that will see a dilution of the group's stake in the company.

news.title: Trump sues BBC for $10 billion, claims defamation from Panorama documentary
news.description: The lawsuit by President Trump against the BBC accuses the British broadcaster of trying to influence the outcome of his 2024 election against Kamala Harris.
